reviewText:
LOVE COMES SOFTLY is a wonderful series of ten movies, but you don't have to pay as much as it looks like it costs on this page. Do a search on

. . . . . . LOVE COMES SOFTLY - 10th ANNIVERSARY COLLECTION
. . . . . . (see picture)

and look for the AMAZON price that is under $10.

LOVE COMES SOFTLY gives us an inspiring look at what life was like in the 19th century, not only in small town life on the prairies, but even in bigger towns, like Sikeston, Missouri.

When you do get over to the (less than $10) page for the Tenth Anniversary Collection of TEN movies, look for my longer review about the ten movies, or read many of the other FIVE STAR reviews.
This movies are great makes you think of all the blessings we have and take for granted.
